entities.name: mr malfoy
entities.description: Mr. Malfoy is described as making a comment about Harry's ability to wriggle out of tight holes, comparing him to a snake.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as being good at escaping and having private matters with the Minister.

entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is described as gripping Harry's shoulder in warning and working on a project involving Muggle artifacts.

relationships.description: Mr. Malfoy makes a comment about Harry's ability to wriggle out of tight holes.
Mr. Weasley grips Harry's shoulder in warning.
Lucius Malfoy asks Arthur Weasley what he is doing there.
Mr. Weasley is working on a project involving Muggle artifacts.
